Alright, I've simplified a few things and mentioned the requirements in the comments. Let me know if you see anything else.

One thing I just started wondering about is whether stacking is what we actually want. An alternative I see would be to require inputs to be `L x 1 x *` if `batch_first` is false, and `1 x L x *` otherwise. Not sure what plays better with other parts of the API.
